page.title: 08VILLAGE ACTIVITIES.
page.content: Haslingfield School is a Community School.On Monday after school there are Brownies and Scouts.On Tuesday there are Brownies,Scouts and the Village Society.On Wednesday we have Cubs and the Choir.On Thursday it is Badminton.On Friday there is Guides,Winemaking and a Pop Group. (R.Lucas & L.Elbourne) The Pavilion:On Monday is the Parish Council.It owns the pavilion.There are 9 people on the Parish Council. On Tuesday there is Keep Fit. On Wednesday the Youth Club takes over the pavilion.There is also a Mother & Toddler group where the mothers supervise the children's play. On Thursday is Good Companions where the over-60s talk and play cards.There is also a Whist Drive. Every morning a Playgroup meets,and at weekends sports teams use it(EB/MS)
